title: Jedinak Photo Album

caption_EN: Abram, Chana (née Gitla Zyto), Louise and Rachel circa 1935

caption_EN: Abram in his military uniform circa 1939

caption_EN: Maternal grands-parents Lejzor and Chana Zyto

caption_FR: De g. à d. au premier rang : Simon, Sarah, Louise et Rachel. Au deuxième rang : Herschl, Ruschka, Abram et Chana

caption_FR: « L'exode sur la route de Fontainebleau (Seine-et-Marne), 13 juin 1940 » Dessin de Jeanine Lagarrigue
caption_EN: "Exodus on the road to Fontainebleau (Seine-et-Marne)." June 13, 1940. Drawing by Jeanine Lagarrigue

caption_FR: Masques à gaz sont distribués aux Parisiens en 1939
caption_EN: Distribution of gas masks to Parisians in 1939

caption_FR: Billet vert et liste d’effets à ramener par la personne accompagnatrice
caption_EN: Green ticket and list of items to be brought back by the person accompanying

caption_FR: Embarcation vers Pithiviers ou Beaune-la-Rolande des victimes de la rafle du billet vert du 14 mai 1941
caption_EN: Men boarding trains to the Pithiviers or Beaune-la-Rolande camps after the Green Ticket round-up on May 14, 1941.

caption_FR: Playground strictly for children. Forbidden to Jews.
caption_EN: Playground strictly for children. Forbidden to Jews.

caption_EN: Camp of Beaune-la-Rolande in 1941

caption_EN: Picture of Louise and Rachel in March 1942 to be sent to their father in Beaune-la-Rolande
